snippet: The Great Race, an annual vintage car rally, recently announced that competitors in the 2012 race would take in the Great Lakes region in a 1,000-mile loop.
abstract: The Great Race, an annual vintage car rally, recently announced that competitors in the 2012 race would take in the Great Lakes region in a 1,000-mile loop.
lead_paragraph: To a dedicated band of tinkerers willing to devote a week or more to nursing old cars over a 1,000-mile rally route, the Great Race is catnip. This year's race, which will route participants around the Great Lakes region in a four-state, one-province loop, begins in Traverse City, Mich. on June 23 and will conclude, at least for those whose old iron withstands the ordeal, in Dearborn, Mich., on July 1.

headline.main: Racing Against Time Around the Great Lakes
